https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/issu6sWXAXAuST1rM8BIV8RybOK.jpg Director Wang Bing casts an understanding and non-judgmental eye on the inmates of a decrepit Chinese mental hospital in this eloquent and emotionally impactful documentary. 'Til Madness Do Us Part
